txt.en: 'Prepare yourself, [placeholder], for death will come swift!'
'It seems we have been played for fools.'
'Do not fail me, men! I want the [placeholder]'s head!'
'My men will make quick work of you!'
'It seems the time for discussion is now at an end.'
Instance: The Fushaum Resolution
'This is not a compromise, Khirgi!'
'This is a list of demands and false promises, just as Sauron had given us.'
'You are a fool to travel down that same path to power.'
'To be curt, all I ask for is your submission.'
'You have much explaining to do, [placeholder].'
'Thâng. Mâlatuk.'
'This is the first time I have agreed with you, Khirgi!'
'Get that [placeholder] for me, men!'
'I could kill you right now if Mâlatuk would allow me!'
'Your lives will be spared and if you serve me well, may you even be rewarded.'
'Why would [placeholder] answer to the likes of you! The [placeholder] works for us!'
'[placeholder], explain to these two that there is no other choice as I am the only one capable of overthrowing Fushaum Tum and keeping these men alive in Mordor!'
'That is if you make it off this bridge alive!'
'This cannot be true as [placeholder] has served me well!'
